meanings.sent1: The leafleteers handed out flyers at the event.
meanings.sent2: The leafleteers spread information about the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent3: The leafleteers joked about having paper cuts from all the flyers.
meanings.sent4: The neighborhood was buzzing with leafleteers like busy bees.
meanings.sent5: The image of the leafleteers in their matching shirts stuck in my mind.

meanings.sent1: The success of the campaign relied on the leafleteers' hard work.
meanings.sent2: Leafleteers play a crucial role in promoting local businesses.
meanings.sent3: The leafleteers' synchronized leaflet dance entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The streets were flooded with leafleteers, creating a sea of paper.
meanings.sent5: The sound of rustling paper followed the leafleteers wherever they went.
